page.title: 13The College in St.Leonard's
page.content: Hastings College of Arts & Technology, a flourishing organization administered by E.Sussex County Council,offers full-time,sandwich,part time day and evening courses plus an extensive short course programme.The 7 departments of Art and Design,Business and General Studies,Construction Studies,Hotel Catering and Beauty Studies,Engineering and Science,Adult and Community Education and,most recently,the Youth Service,offer a wide range of vocational and non- vocational courses.Students come mainly from the eastern area of E. Sussex.Full-time students may come from further afield,some from E.E.C. countries.There are about 200 overseas students.Full-time course tuition fees are Â£520 (under 18),Â£1,736 (over 18), while an overseas student would pay Â£3,310 for the same course.
